REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0435 reute b f BC-DANSK-NATURGAS-ISSUES 04-08 0083

TEXT.TITLE: DANSK NATURGAS ISSUES 10 BILLION YEN EUROBOND
TEXT.BODY: Dansk Naturgas A/S is issuing a 10 billion yen eurobond due May 13, 1993 paying 4-5/8 pct and priced at 101-5/8 pct, lead manager IBJ International Ltd said. The non-callable bond is available in denominations of one mln yen and will be listed in Luxembourg. The selling concession is 1-1/4 pct while management and underwriting combined pays 5/8 pct. The issue is guaranteed by Denmark. The payment date is May 13. REUTER
